Mr. Prank E. Schooley, Ex. Sec’ty.
Nat’l. Assn, of Educational Broadcasters
University of Illinois
Urbana, Ill.
My dear Prank:
Just received your note and the copies of the
correspondence. Judging by the tone of the
Darnejl letter, it doesnTt sound encouraging.
I’m placing a call for Early in Camden to talk
it over with him and to get any information prior
to the meeting that they suggest in their letter
of September 14th.
Very sincerely yours,
_—-,
MSN:RK Director
NEW YORK
WORLD'S FAIR 1939
